paragraph.paragraph: Every assembly reference in an EiffelEnvision project has a context menu. Below describes the options available for the context menu and their actions.

View in Object Browser
Opens the ../../../code_browsing/object_browser/index.xmlObject Browser and highlights the corresponding assembly present in the EiffelEnvision project section of the Object Browser.

Remove
Removes the reference from the project.
For references_folder.xmlcomCOM References any generated interop assembly will be removed from the obj folder once the assembly has been removed.
For references_folder.xmlstaticStatic Assembly ReferencesRemove will be unavailable because EiffelEnvision handles the adding and removing of these types of references.

Properties
Displays the properties window for the selected reference ../../configuring/project_configuration/item_configuration/reference.xmlProperties.
